sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import styles from "./PlayerScore.module.css" export default function PlayerScore({ playerType ,scoreData }) { return (
{playerType === "Hitter" ? (
  • ERA {scoreData.era}
  • 이닝 {scoreData.ip}
  • WHIP {scoreData.whip}
) : (
  • 타율 {scoreData.avg}
  • OPS {scoreData.ops}
  • WAR {scoreData.war}
)}
); }
